Yep, I have placed my torture set back in this area's file section.  
For those of you unfamiliar, the torture set does not have a plot, but 
 is a set of scenarios I publish that legitimate teams usually can't 
beat.  No, there is no plot in the torture scenarios.

I don't bother listing scenario numbers for that set because I 
consider most of them "illegimate" because of the experience level of 
the opponents.  I don't mind any of my torture scenarios being 
incoporated into a set as long as proper credit is given. 

::"Druid Island" is legimate if you can beat it::

If you want more torture scenarios, email me.  In fact, I am thinking 
about creating more torture scenarios to take advantage of tricks I 
know about for making normally "tough" scenarios easier to beat.
